item.title: Reinforcement Learning
item.description:
Prep: Formalizing the RL problem

Reinforcement learning is the science of decision making. What does it mean to make decisions? Making decisions requires one to take into account the current circumstances and then take an action(s) keeping the long term effects of the decision in mind. RL is no different.

The way humans “learn” to make decisions using their life experiences is analogous to the “learning” part in Reinforcement Learning.
